sentences.english: We should recognize that the body is undesirable. So we must self-reflect and be fearful.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該要知道可憎，這是一個非常可憎厭的東西。

sentences.english: But if you are still dutiful to parents who hate you.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你的父母親憎厭你。

sentences.english: This is a compromise which God still hates and does not want to see in his children.
sentences.chinese: 然而，這種與世俗妥協的做法，卻是神所憎厭的。

sentences.english: Silently she frowned with a look of utter distaste.
sentences.chinese: 她沉默着皺一皺眉頭，露出一股極爲憎厭的神情。

sentences.english: Discrimination of any sort is abhorrent to a civilized society.
sentences.chinese: 文明社會中任何類型的歧視都遭人憎厭。
